name: ISP I SPY
description:
The goal of the game is to reconnect a LAN cable to a socket. There will be two opposing teams The ISP, the team who’s trying to get the cable to the socket. And The Hackers, the team who’s trying to stop The ISP from reconnecting the plug.

made for the #MultiplayerGGJ

---

IMPORTANT: Windows Build > HTML Build for Graphics & Network Performance!
---
